description:
Here are details on our subscription* offer:

Weekly Subscription
Let’s start your subscription that is free on 3-days.
The subscription is for a week and is renewed every week. The charge is starting from $7.99 that may vary according to packages you prefer.
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period.You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings.Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Monthly Subscription
The subscription is for a month and is renewed every month. The charge is starting from $12.99 that may vary according to packages you prefer.
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period.You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings.Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

3-Months Subscription
The subscription is for 3-months and is renewed every 3-months. The charge is starting from $29.99 that may vary according to packages you prefer.
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period.You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings.Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Annual Subscription
The subscription is for a year and is renewed every year. The charge is starting from $44.99 that may vary according to packages you prefer.
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period.You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings.Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
• You can cancel your subscription by entering the following address: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039
